World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 3 月 11 日星期一 00:41:17 GMT 120
France's Macron postpones trip to UkraineA visit by President Emmanuel Macron to Ukraine should take place in the coming weeks, the French Presidency said on Sunday, the third time a planned trip to the country has been postponed since February. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 22:27:03 GMT TZRJDCSTRJOTZMAHTVK3RUGVRE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/france-macron-postpones-trip-to-ukraine-2024-03-10/Reuters世界欧洲
Panama upholds ex-President Martinelli's ban from 2024 electionPanama's electoral court announced on Sunday it had upheld its decision to ban ex-President Ricardo Martinelli from running in the 2024 general election, following the review of a challenge presented by Martinelli's defense to annul the prohibition. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 22:04:38 GMT MRB7YZSGINPTTC7UO6GUNEVVB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/panama-upholds-ex-president-martinellis-bans-2024-election-2024-03-10/Reuters世界美洲
Australia scraps 'nuisance' tariffs to remove red tape, lower living costsAustralia said on Monday it would remove import tariffs on a wide range of goods including toothbrushes, toasters, hand tools and clothing in a bid to eliminate red tape for businesses and bring relief to families battling higher living costs. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 21:42:24 GMT GYQL3EQYZNI4TL75VJ6BBTN7BY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-scraps-nuisance-tariffs-remove-red-tape-lower-living-costs-2024-03-10/Reuters世界亚太地区
Israel unveils revised Eurovision song after lyrics controversyIsrael unveiled its revised submission for the Eurovision song contest on Sunday, after organisers took issue with the original entry's reference to the Oct. 7 Hamas onslaught. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 21:10:19 GMT YC7DNAIHC5LWJJJJQM7H567JJQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-unveils-revised-eurovision-song-after-lyrics-controversy-2024-03-10/Reuters世界中东地区
Hamas chief blames Israel for stalled ceasefire talks, leaves door openHamas chief Ismail Haniyeh blamed Israel on Sunday for stalling ceasefire talks and rejecting Hamas's demand to end the war on Gaza, but said the group was still seeking a negotiated solution. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 19:51:03 GMT ZTXZH36EFZNITJWEVEJEMGNQI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-chief-blames-israel-stalled-ceasefire-talks-leaves-door-open-2024-03-10/Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东地区
Netanyahu says at least 13,000 'terrorists' among Palestinians killedIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday that at least 13,000 "terrorists" were among Palestinians killed during Israel's war against Hamas in the Gaza Strip and vowed to press ahead with an offensive in the south of the enclave - a move U.S. President Joe Biden has described as his red line. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 19:18:27 GMT H2PIQ4PR75NBJCAV4CONT https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-says-least-13000-terrorists-killed-among-palestinians-2024-03-10/Reuters世界中东地区
Ukraine rebuffs Pope Francis calling for talks with RussiaForeign minister Dmytro Kuleba, responding to the pope's call to show "the courage of the white flag," said "Our flag is a yellow and blue one," and told the Vatican to pay heed to its role in World War Two. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 18:35:28 GMT F3WG2QHQWFK5XMRWWFVIRTWNCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-minister-responding-pope-francis-says-kyiv-will-never-raise-white-flag-2024-03-10/Reuters世界欧洲
Macron backs 'end of life' bill, aims for parliament debate in MayPresident Emmanuel Macron said on Sunday for the first time that he backed new end-of-life legislation that would allow what he called "help to die" and wanted his government to put forward a draft bill to parliament in May. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 17:58:55 GMT A7HGZUXUXVIUVEPUWUFSBNLMYU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/macron-backs-end-life-bill-aims-parliament-debate-may-2024-03-10/Elizabeth Pineau, John Irish世界欧洲
Libyan leaders agree to form new unified governmentThree key Libyan leaders said on Sunday they had agreed on the "necessity" of forming a new unified government that would supervise long-delayed elections. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 17:13:11 GMT 37GPHTKVUBMBFCCENFS3KXQ2NOW https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/libyan-leaders-agree-to-form-new-unified-government-2024-03-10/Reuters世界非洲
St. Petersburg airport resumes operations after drone shot down in nearby regionPulkovo airport in Saint Petersburg has resumed operations as Russian Defence Ministry said a Ukrainian drone was shot down in the neighbouring Leningrad region on Sunday. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 15:56:24 GMT BMS7774MTNIPG4HMMVMAWAC5MU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/st-petersburg-airport-resumes-operations-after-drone-shot-down-nearby-region-2024-03-10/Reuters世界欧洲
Gaza aid ship waiting to sail from Cyprus as charity builds jetty, source saysA ship carrying tonnes of food for Gaza remained docked in a Cyprus port on Sunday as preparations were underway to launch a yet untested maritime aid route to the enclave, where the United Nations estimates a quarter of the population [USN:L2N3FJ212 TEXT:"faces starvation"]. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 15:19:46 GMT NDPTTCX2PJKPRHL3LWFQQU5VUI https://www.reuters.com/world/gaza-aid-ship-waiting-to-sail-cyprus-charity-builds-jetty-source-says-2024-03-10/Yiannis Kourtoglou, Stamos Prousalis世界
